isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CLUTCH CONTROL LINKAGE - 9600, 9700 AND 9800 SERIES - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: LUBRICATION
svcproc.para: Clutch control components (the release bearing, release shaft, relay shaft and linkage yoke pins) should be lubricated with the type of lubricant and at the intervals specified in GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual, and at the time of clutch or clutch control linkage service.
Some clutches are equipped with pre-lubricated, sealed release bearings which do not require periodic lubrication.
